pli-tv-pvr19:1.1: “How many offenses are there by body?
pli-tv-pvr19:1.4: How many on account of contact?”
pli-tv-pvr19:2.4: And five on account of contact.”
pli-tv-pvr19:3.1: “How many offenses are there at dawn?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.2: How many after the third announcement?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.3: How many here have eight parts?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.4: Through how many are they all included?”
pli-tv-pvr19:4.4: They are all included through one.”
pli-tv-pvr19:5.1: “How many sources are there of the Monastic Law
pli-tv-pvr19:5.2: That were laid down by the Buddha?
pli-tv-pvr19:5.3: How many are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law?
pli-tv-pvr19:5.4: How many kinds of concealing are there of grave offenses?”
pli-tv-pvr19:6.1: “There are two sources of the Monastic Law
pli-tv-pvr19:6.2: That were laid down by the Buddha.
pli-tv-pvr19:6.3: Two are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law.
pli-tv-pvr19:6.4: There are two kinds of concealing of grave offenses.”
pli-tv-pvr19:7.1: “How many offenses are there concerning the next village?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.2: How many offenses are there on account of crossing a river?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.3: How many serious offenses are there in relation to meat?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.4: How many offenses of wrong conduct are there in relation to meat?”
pli-tv-pvr19:8.1: “There are four offenses concerning the next village,
pli-tv-pvr19:8.2: And four on account of crossing a river.
pli-tv-pvr19:8.3: There is one serious offense in relation to meat,
pli-tv-pvr19:8.4: And nine offenses of wrong conduct.”
pli-tv-pvr19:9.1: “How many offenses are there by speech at night?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.2: How many offenses are there by speech by day?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.3: How many offenses are there for giving?
pli-tv-pvr19:10.1: “There are two offenses by speech at night,
pli-tv-pvr19:10.2: And there are two by speech by day.
pli-tv-pvr19:11.0: 2. Offenses that are clearable by confession, etc.
pli-tv-pvr19:11.1: “How many kinds of offenses are clearable by confession?
pli-tv-pvr19:11.2: How many require amends to be made?
pli-tv-pvr19:11.3: How many here do not to require amends,
pli-tv-pvr19:11.4: Said the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:12.2: Six require amends to be made,
pli-tv-pvr19:12.3: And one does not require amends,
pli-tv-pvr19:12.4: Said the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:13.1: “How many are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law,
pli-tv-pvr19:13.3: How many grain juices are allowable at the wrong time?
pli-tv-pvr19:13.4: How many appointments are made through one motion and three announcements?”
pli-tv-pvr19:14.1: “Two are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law,
pli-tv-pvr19:14.3: One grain juice is allowable at the wrong time,
pli-tv-pvr19:14.4: And one appointment is made through one motion and three announcements.
pli-tv-pvr19:15.1: “How many offenses entailing expulsion are done by body?
pli-tv-pvr19:15.2: How many grounds are there for belonging to the same Buddhist sect?
pli-tv-pvr19:15.3: For how many kinds of people are there non-countable days?
pli-tv-pvr19:16.1: “Two such offenses are done by body,
pli-tv-pvr19:16.2: And there are two grounds for belonging to the same Buddhist sect.
pli-tv-pvr19:16.3: There are non-countable days for two kinds of people,
pli-tv-pvr19:17.1: “How many are there on having struck oneself?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.2: How many kinds of people cause a schism in the Sangha?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.3: How many here are immediate offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.4: How many ways are there of doing a motion?”
pli-tv-pvr19:18.1: “There are two on having struck oneself,
pli-tv-pvr19:18.2: And two kinds cause a schism in the Sangha.
pli-tv-pvr19:18.4: And there are two ways of doing a motion.”
pli-tv-pvr19:19.1: “How many offenses are there for killing living beings?
pli-tv-pvr19:19.2: How many are the offenses entailing expulsion because of speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:19.3: How many offenses are spoken about indecent speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:20.1: “There are three offenses for killing living beings,
pli-tv-pvr19:20.2: And three offenses of expulsion because of speech.
pli-tv-pvr19:20.3: Three offenses are spoken about indecent speech,
pli-tv-pvr19:21.1: “How many kinds of people should not be ordained?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.2: How many things are included in legal procedures?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.3: How many are said to be expelled?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.4: How many are included in a single proclamation?”
pli-tv-pvr19:22.2: And three things are included in legal procedures.
pli-tv-pvr19:22.3: Three are said to be expelled,
pli-tv-pvr19:22.4: And three are included in a single proclamation.”
pli-tv-pvr19:23.1: “How many offenses are there for stealing?
pli-tv-pvr19:23.2: How many on account of sexual intercourse?
pli-tv-pvr19:23.4: And how many offenses on account of discarding?”
pli-tv-pvr19:24.2: And four on account of sexual intercourse.
pli-tv-pvr19:24.3: There are three offenses for cutting,
pli-tv-pvr19:24.4: And five on account of discarding.”
pli-tv-pvr19:25.1: “In the sub-chapter on the instructor of nuns
pli-tv-pvr19:25.2: There are offenses of wrong conduct together with the offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr19:25.3: How many groups of nine are spoken of there?
pli-tv-pvr19:26.1: “In the sub-chapter on the instructor of nuns
pli-tv-pvr19:26.2: There is one offense of wrong conduct together with one offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr19:26.3: Four groups of nine are spoken of there,
pli-tv-pvr19:27.2: Have been declared to the nuns?
pli-tv-pvr19:27.4: How many are the offenses of wrong conduct, together with the offense entailing confession?”
pli-tv-pvr19:28.2: Have been declared to the nuns.
pli-tv-pvr19:28.4: There is one offense of wrong conduct together with one offense entailing confession.”
pli-tv-pvr19:29.1: “How many offenses are there for traveling?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.2: And how many are there for standing?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.3: How many offenses are there for sitting?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.4: And how many are there for lying down?”
pli-tv-pvr19:30.2: And the same number for standing.
pli-tv-pvr19:30.3: There are four offenses for sitting,
pli-tv-pvr19:30.4: And the same number for lying down.”
pli-tv-pvr19:35.3: Should be confessed by how many statements,
pli-tv-pvr19:35.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:36.3: That should be confessed by one statement,
pli-tv-pvr19:36.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:37.3: Should be confessed by how many statements,
pli-tv-pvr19:37.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:38.3: That should be confessed by one statement,
pli-tv-pvr19:38.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:39.3: Should one describe and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:39.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:40.3: Where one should describe the basis and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:40.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:41.3: Should one describe and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:41.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:42.3: Where one should describe the basis and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:42.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:43.1: “How many offenses are there after the third announcement?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.2: How many are there on account of speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.3: How many are there for eating?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.4: And how many on account of cooked food?
pli-tv-pvr19:44.1: “There are three offenses after the third announcement,
pli-tv-pvr19:44.2: And six on account of speech.
pli-tv-pvr19:44.3: There are three offenses for eating,
pli-tv-pvr19:44.4: And five on account of cooked food.”
pli-tv-pvr19:45.1: “Of all offenses after the third announcement,
pli-tv-pvr19:45.3: And for how many are there offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:45.4: And for how many is there a legal issue?”
pli-tv-pvr19:46.1: “Of all offenses after the third announcement,
pli-tv-pvr19:46.3: And there are offenses for five,
pli-tv-pvr19:47.1: “For how many is there a decision?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.2: For how many is there a resolution?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.3: For how many is there no offense?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.4: For how many reasons does one shine?”
pli-tv-pvr19:48.3: There is no offense for five,
pli-tv-pvr19:48.4: And one shines for five reasons.”
pli-tv-pvr19:49.1: “How many offenses are there by body at night?
pli-tv-pvr19:49.2: How many are there by body by day?
pli-tv-pvr19:49.3: How many offenses are there for staring?
pli-tv-pvr19:49.4: How many on account of almsfood?”
pli-tv-pvr19:50.1: “There are two offenses by body at night,
pli-tv-pvr19:50.2: And there are two by body by day.
pli-tv-pvr19:50.3: There is one offense for staring,
pli-tv-pvr19:50.4: And one on account of almsfood.”
pli-tv-pvr19:51.2: Should one confess out of confidence in others?
pli-tv-pvr19:51.3: How many kinds of people are said to be ejected?
pli-tv-pvr19:51.4: And how many are the proper conducts?”
pli-tv-pvr19:52.2: One should confess out of confidence in others.
pli-tv-pvr19:52.3: Three kinds are said to be ejected,
pli-tv-pvr19:52.4: And there are forty-three proper conducts.”
pli-tv-pvr19:53.1: “How many cases of lying are there?
pli-tv-pvr19:53.3: How many offenses entailing acknowledgment are there?
pli-tv-pvr19:53.4: And for how many is there confession?”
pli-tv-pvr19:54.3: There are twelve offenses entailing acknowledgment,
pli-tv-pvr19:54.4: And there is confession for four.”
pli-tv-pvr19:55.2: And how many factors the observance day?
pli-tv-pvr19:55.3: How many are the qualities of a qualified messenger?
pli-tv-pvr19:55.4: How many are the customs of monastics of other religions?”
pli-tv-pvr19:56.3: A qualified messenger has eight qualities,
pli-tv-pvr19:56.4: And other monastics have eight customs.”
pli-tv-pvr19:57.1: “How many statements are there for an ordination?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.2: For how many should one get up?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.3: To how many should one give a seat?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.4: Through how many qualities is one an instructor of the nuns?”
pli-tv-pvr19:58.1: “There are eight statements for an ordination.
pli-tv-pvr19:58.2: One should get up for eight kinds of people,
pli-tv-pvr19:58.3: And likewise give a seat to eight.
pli-tv-pvr19:58.4: One an instructor of the nuns through eight qualities.”
pli-tv-pvr19:59.1: “For how many is there a ‘cutting off’?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.2: For how many is there a serious offense?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.3: And for how many is there no offense?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.4: It is given that all of them did the same act as basis.”
pli-tv-pvr19:60.3: And there is no offense for four—
pli-tv-pvr19:60.4: Given that all of them did the same act as basis.”
pli-tv-pvr19:61.1: “How many are the grounds for resentment?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.2: How many kinds of people cause a schism in the Sangha?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.3: How many here are immediate offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.4: How many ways are there of doing a motion?”
pli-tv-pvr19:62.2: And nine kinds of people cause a schism.
pli-tv-pvr19:62.4: And nine ways of doing a motion.”
pli-tv-pvr19:63.0: 4. Persons one should not pay respect to, etc.
pli-tv-pvr19:63.1: “How many kinds of people should one not bow down to,
pli-tv-pvr19:63.2: Nor raise one’s joined palms to, nor do acts of respect toward?
pli-tv-pvr19:63.3: For how many is there an offense of wrong conduct?
pli-tv-pvr19:63.4: How many days of keeping a robe?”
pli-tv-pvr19:64.1: “There are ten kinds of people one should not bow down to,
pli-tv-pvr19:64.2: Nor raise one’s joined palms to, nor do acts of respect toward.
pli-tv-pvr19:64.3: There is an offense of wrong doing for ten.
pli-tv-pvr19:64.4: There are ten days of keeping a robe.”
pli-tv-pvr19:65.1: “To how many kinds of people who have completed the rains residence
pli-tv-pvr19:65.3: When how many exist, should it be given?
pli-tv-pvr19:65.4: And to how many kinds of people should it not be given?”
pli-tv-pvr19:66.1: “Robe-cloth should be given to five kinds
pli-tv-pvr19:66.2: Who have completed the rains residence.
pli-tv-pvr19:66.3: When seven exist, it should be give,
pli-tv-pvr19:66.4: And it should not be given to sixteen kinds.”
pli-tv-pvr19:67.1: “Having concealing how many hundreds of offenses
pli-tv-pvr19:67.4: Could he be released from probation?”
pli-tv-pvr19:68.4: He could be released from probation.”
pli-tv-pvr19:69.1: “How many kinds of flaws in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:69.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:69.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:70.1: “Twelve kinds of flaws in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:70.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:70.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:71.1: “How many kinds of successes in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:71.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:71.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:72.1: “Four kinds of successes in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:72.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:72.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:73.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:73.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:73.4: How many were legitimate and how many illegitimate?”
pli-tv-pvr19:74.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:74.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:74.6: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:75.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:75.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:75.4: How many were legitimate and how many illegitimate?”
pli-tv-pvr19:76.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:76.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of those from Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:76.6: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:77.1: “In regard to the classes of offenses taught by the unbounded Victor, the Unshakable One,
pli-tv-pvr19:77.3: How many are settled without settling?
pli-tv-pvr19:77.4: You who are skilled in analysis, please say.”
pli-tv-pvr19:78.1: “In regard to the classes of offenses taught by the unbounded Victor, the Unshakable One,
pli-tv-pvr19:78.4: I declare this to you who are skilled in analysis.”
pli-tv-pvr19:79.1: “How many who are destined to misery
pli-tv-pvr19:79.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:79.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:80.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:80.3: Destined to misery, bound for hell,
pli-tv-pvr19:80.4: He who causes a schism in the Sangha remains there for an eon.
pli-tv-pvr19:80.6: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:81.1: “How many who are not destined to misery
pli-tv-pvr19:81.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:81.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:82.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:82.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:83.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:83.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:84.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:84.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”

pli-tv-pvr19:85.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:86.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:86.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:87.1: “How many kinds of flaws in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:87.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:87.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:88.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:88.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”

pli-tv-pvr19:89.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:89.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”

pli-tv-pvr19:99.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”

pli-tv-pvr19:101.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”

pli-tv-pvr19:103.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:104.1: “One hundred and eighty-eight offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-pvr19:104.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:104.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:105.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:105.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”

pli-tv-pvr19:106.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:107.1: “How many rules to be trained in
pli-tv-pvr19:107.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:107.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.”
pli-tv-pvr19:108.2: Were spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:108.4: One who understands the Monastic Law.
pli-tv-pvr19:109.1: What has been well asked by you,
pli-tv-pvr19:109.2: What has been well answered by me,
pli-tv-pvr19:109.3: For either the questions or the answers,
pli-tv-pvr19:109.4: There is nothing apart from the Teaching.”
pli-tv-pvr19:110.1: The second collection of verses is finished.
